title: karuduvOm dinamE
sahitya:
karuduvOm dinamE murugan tirunAmam


anupallavi

  oru siridu nEramEnum ODa viDAd-emmanadai oru nilaiyil nirutti Om murugA Om enavE


caraNam    padam avanuDaiyadE shatam enavE nambi iduvarai paTTa iDar inimEl viTTaghala
ati viraivil aruLai aLikkum mAru kOri harahara muruganE sharaNam enak-kUri
